An outstanding student, Nogueille plans to major in Communications with a Concentration in Business, and will graduate Kepler with a BA from an accredited US university. He also hopes to improve his public speaking skills and fluency with technology. After graduating, his dream is to become a successful entrepreneur and develop a company that can provide opportunities to his fellow Rwandans.

Nogueille especially wants to give back to children and increase his family's standard of living.

loans.use: To pay for a laptop required for a US college degree

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes and purses for women.

loans.name: Kampala Group

texts.en:
Natasha, who is in her mid 20s, is single with one child who is still going to school. She has been running a wine shop for two years now. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Natasha’s first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to increase her wine stock and serve more customers. She dreams of owning a very big wine shop and expanding her business.

Natasha will share this loan with her loan group, Kampala Group, which consists of four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her wine stock and serve more customers.

loans.name: Museveki

texts.en:
Museveki is a 28-year-old green grocer in Mombasa, Kenya. She is a married mother of two who has been in this business for the last two years and is doing well.

This marks her first borrowing from VisionFund Kenya to finance her business. She will use the loan to purchase fruits and vegetables and the anticipated profit to repay her loan. She hopes to own a successful business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 61 years old. He is married and has four children. 

His business is farming and keeping livestock. He has been in this business for 11 years. 

He earns a monthly income of fifteen thousand Kenya shillings. 

This is his second loan with VisionFund Kenya. He will use the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. 

He will use the profits from expanded business to educate his children. 

His hopes and dreams are to have a healthy family and a learned family

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Baraka Office Group

texts.fr: Sabimana est commerçante, conseillère de la banque communautaire «Baraka Office», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, divorcée, âgée de 38 ans, mère des 7 enfants scolarisés. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires à son domicile dans une avenue animée de la ville depuis 25 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en huile végétale, riz, etc. C’est son encien mari qui l’avait aidé pour commencer son activité. Elle souhaite renforcer son capital, scolariser  et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Sabimana is a trader and member of the loan group 'Baraka Office' which works with the field partner, Hekima. She is thirty-eight years old, divorced and mother to seven children who all attend school. She has been selling basic foodstuffs from her home on a busy avenue for twenty-five years.

Sabimana plans to use her loan to buy vegetable oil, rice and other foods. Her ex-husband provided the initial funds for her to start her business. She would like to improve her working capital, feed and educate her children.

Sabimana is very grateful to Hekima for the support they offer to non-bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy vegetable oil, rice and other basic foodstuffs.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is 33 years old and married with two children both of whom are in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Jovelyn is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Jovelyn has been raising pigs for ten years and also earns additional income from selling frozen food.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dreams: to save enough money to expand her business and to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Ramzana

texts.en: Ramzana is a 52-year-old married woman. She has run a milk selling business for many years with the help of her husband. She has buffaloes for milking purpose. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation. Now she has requested for a loan of 45000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo to increase milk sales to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo to increase milk sales to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.name: Anwer

texts.en:
Anwer is 46 years old. She is a married woman. In order to meet her household expenses, she started her business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income.

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 50,000 to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen belongs to a poor family. She lives with her family in the area of Rawalpindi, Pakistan.

Yasmeen is well trained in clothes stitching. She provides services in stitching to people at her own house. She needs to purchase a sewing machine and a variety of stitching materials for her work, including threads, needles, clothing etc. This is very important for her to continue her work efficiently and professionally. However, due to the lack of money she finds it difficult, so Yasmeen is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan.

BRAC Pakistan issued her loan as per her requirement. Yasmeen is very thankful to Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and stitching materials for her own stitching work.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
Saima is a 31-year-old working woman. After her marriage, she felt that she should support her husband to improve their financial condition. So she started a business of selling clothes. She believes she can earn some respect and make a better world for her children and their education.

Saima is famous among her neighbors for her collections and has a good client list. Currently she needs a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment. This would lead her to live a decent life and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El es un joven empleado  que presenta  un diente impactado en la zona inferior de su boca por lo que necesita una cirugía de urgencia, desafortunadamente en su trabajo los ingresos que le pagan son pocos, además de que él es el único sustento de su familia.
texts.en: This young employee has an impacted tooth in the lower part of his mouth for which he needs emergency surgery.  Unfortunately, he earns little income in his job, and he's also the only source of support for his family.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment

loans.name: Four Sisters Group

texts.en:
Four Sisters is a group of four ladies who have a good relationship that is more than that of blood sisters. In this group is Letwin who buys and sells coffin handles to her customers. Her clients are coffin manufacturers in Kuwadzana, Glenview, Marondera, Mutare and many other places. Though her income-generating activity is premised on death, Letwin has been able to overturn an occurrence associated with sadness to the sort that brings sustenance. 

Every fortnight she travels across cities to either supply her customers or follow up on her repayments. She is a very hardworking lady in her late 40s and has been able to send her children to school and to complement her husband’s income in meeting other home expenses. She crosses the Zimbabwe/South Africa border once, and sometimes twice, every month. 

She wants to improve her procurement capacity so that she benefits from economies of scale and reduce her travelling so that she can spend more time with her family. A Kiva loan through Thrive Microfinance will help her to buy large volumes of stock at once and achieve some of the above.

loans.use: To increase her stock of handles for sale to coffin makers .

loans.name: Edna

texts.en: Edna is a sari-sari store owner from Concepcion, Iloilo. She is married and has five children. Two of these are still school-aged children who are 19 and 17 years old. Edna is doing a sari-sari store business to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. She is asking a loan to buy grocery items such as chips, biscuits, candies, chocolate bars, coffee, sugar, powdered chocolate drink, spices, noodles, canned goods, cooking oil, eggs, drinking liquor and soft drinks. She also plans to buy a pig. Perhaps she has another business to give her extra income. In the future, she dreams of improving their livelihood to have a better means of living.

loans.use: to buy chips, biscuits, candies, chocolate bars, coffee, sugar, powdered chocolate drink, spices, noodles, canned goods, cooking oil, eggs, drinking liquor, soft drinks and a pig.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is a 27-year-old mother of two in Kilifi, Kenya. She sells roasted cashew nuts and groundnuts to her clients; for the past eleven years she has done great.

This is her first borrowing to finance her business, She will use the loan to purchase cashew nuts and ground nuts for resale at a profit. With the anticipated profit, Regina will be able to expand her business.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to open a food stall and stock snacks of different varieties in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase cashew nuts and ground nuts to resell at a profit.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 56 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Mercy is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs. Mercy has been raising pigs for 21 years and also earns additional income from selling clothes and frozen foods.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Socheat

texts.en:
Socheat is 37 years old, living in a wooden house located in Kampong Cham province. She has five children, three of whom are schoolchildren and the others are below the age of school.

Growing cassava and rice farming have been the primary sources of income for 19 years. Recently, her business has not grown well since she has not enough ability to buy weedicide to protect her farm for weeding.

After successfully repaying the entire previous loan, Socheat is going to get a new loan with VisionFund. She will use her second loan to buy weedicide and fertilizer, which are expected to increase the productivity of her crops. She hopes that this new loan will enable her to get a good quality of crop so she can sell it for good profit and this will allow her to renovate her old house.

loans.use: to buy weedicide and fertilizer, which are expected to increase the productivity of her crops.

loans.name: Nuzahat

texts.en:
Nuzahat is a happily married woman. Some years ago, she decided to support her family by starting a business of tailoring at her home, as her husband's income was barely enough to meet their day-to-day expenses.

She is popularly known in her area for her skill in stitching. However, due to a shortage of raw material, she is facing difficulty in meeting daily expenses related to her business. Therefore, she has requested for a loan of PKR 40,000. With the requested loan, she wants to purchase stitching material, such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth to stitch up more dresses on time. She hopes to get an increase in her income.

loans.use: to purchase stitching material, such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth to stitch up more dresses on time.

loans.name: Zabdiel De Jesus

texts.es: Zabdiel de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su pade, el posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años tiene muchos clientes especialmente sus vecinos con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Zabdiel is 30 years old and lives in his own house with his father. He has a store located in his house where for several years he has had many customers, especially his neighbors. From his sales he is able to meet some of the household expenses.

He is seeking a loan to buy more soups, eggs, staple grains, drinks, candies, pastries, etc., in order to increase his earnings and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soups, eggs, staple grains, drinks, candies, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Grupo Chutinamit No. 1 Group

texts.es:
Catarina es una madre de familia de 26 años de edad, es casada con una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 5 y 8 años de edad, esta familia vive en una comunidad del Caserío Chutinamit.
Catarina (la primera del lado derecho de la fotografía) es una mujer con la visión de superación, y se esfuerza día con adía para la prosperidad de su familia, ella lleva 5 años vendiendo productos de cosmetería en los lugares circunvecinos de su comunidad. Catarina gracias a su amabilidad y sinceridad con que trata a sus clientes mucha gente, lo busca frecuentemente con esta demanda de producto ella se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para la compra de más productos de cosméticos para satisfacer mejor las necesidades de sus clientes.
Su gran anhelo es conseguir el crédito para la compra de sus mercaderías y en el futuro construir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Catarina is a 26 year old mother. She is married and has a beautiful family of three children between the ages of 5 and 8. Her family lives in the Caserío Chutinamit community. Catarina (the first from the right in the photograph) is a woman with a vision of bettering herself. She strives day after day for the prosperity of her family.

For 5 years she has been selling cosmetic products in the areas surrounding her community. Thanks to her friendliness and the sincerity with which she treats her customers, many people seek her out frequently. This demand for her products led to her need to seek a loan to buy more cosmetic products in order to meet the needs of her customers. Her big dream is to obtain the loan for the purchase of more merchandise, and in the future, to build her own home.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetic products for her business.

loans.name: Anjali Andrea

texts.es: Anjali   de 22 años de edad  soltera y sin hijos, es un excelente estudiante de la facultad de INGENIERÍA ECONÓMICA. Con la ayuda de sus padres  Anjali   ha sabido salir adelante y dedicarse a estudiar mucho. Ella ya está en los últimos ciclos de la carrera con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. Anjali  está logrando un buen record de notas y así poder ser  exitosa en la vida. Con el préstamo otorgado ella podrá realizar los pagos de su matrícula y pensión universitaria. Anjali  se encuentra muy agradecida  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con un fuerte abrazo de Kiva y diciéndoles que cumplirá la promesa de salir adelante y de ser una persona exitosa.
texts.en:
Anjali is 22 years old, single, and does not have children. She is an excellent student in the Economic Engineering department. With the help of her parents, Anjali has learned to get ahead and dedicate herself to studying a lot. She is now in her last cycle of the major and putting in a lot of effort and dedication. Anjali is achieving a record of good grades and this way she can be successful in life.

With the loan that is given, she will be able to make the payments for her university registration and housing. Anjali is very grateful for the help provided and says goodbye with a strong hug for Kiva, telling them that she will keep her promise to get ahead and be a successful person.

loans.use: to pay for registration and housing.

loans.name: Honorable Rosa Group

texts.es: Maryorie  tiene 31 años de edad es soltera con 03 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de trabajos a base de corrospum para colegios iniciales adornos navideños y para eventos como baby showers. Y a la vez hace eventos de animación para fiestas infantiles. El crédito lo invertira en la compra de mas corrospum pegamentos y demás accesorios para la elaboración de su trabajos. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. maryorie es la primera del lado derecho.
texts.en:
Maryorie is 31 years old. She is single, with 3 dependent children. She works making items out of craft foam for primary schools, Christmas decorations, and events such as baby showers. In addition, she does animated events for kids' parties.

She will spend the loan on the purchase of more craft foam adhesive and other accessories for the making of her pieces.

The group is grateful to Kiva lenders for the provided loan. Maryorie is the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy more craft foam adhesive

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en:
Khadija is a 43-year-old married woman with five children. She is very skilled in the art of hand embroidery and has been using her skills for many years to earn a living. Khadija makes beautiful designs and patterns by hand and her skill is well-known throughout her town. 

Khadija is requesting a 40,000 PKR loan to purchase more beads, threads, and frames. She will use her loan to meet customer orders on time. Khadija will use her loan to earn good amounts of profit. This will take her closer to her dream of providing quality education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more beads, threads, and frames

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de maiz, frijo y maicillo desde hace varios años e inicio con capital propia comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de insumos agricolas para tener una buena cosecha y asi poder obtener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
49-year-old Juan lives with his three children in a house that he owns. For many years, he has made a living growing corn, beans, and sorghum, and he used his own money to start. He sells his products in the neighboring towns, and with his earnings, he is able to keep moving forward.

He is requesting a loan to purchase farming supplies, in order to have a good harvest and obtain better economic income.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Soem Leng

texts.en:
Soem Leng is 45 years old and a mother of two dependent children, one of whom is in school. She lives in a rural village of Kampong Cham province. For the past 25 years, Soem Leng has been a rice farmer. She also grows soybeans to earn an income to support her family. Soem Leng’s crop is often destroyed by insect pests which results in a low profit. 

Soem Leng is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer to increase her crop yield. This will be her sixth loan cycle with VisionFund. She repaid her previous loans successfully. Soem Leng used her previous loans to expand her farmland to grow her crop. Soem Leng hopes to increase her income in order to save for future needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to increase her crop yield

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Las Soñadoras Group

texts.es: La Sra. Ana    de 28  años de edad soltera  y madre de  1 hijo, ella es una de las integrantes del grupo “LAS SOÑADORAS”. La Sra. Ana    tiene una pequeña bodega  en su mismo domicilio  ya hace  4 años. La Sra. Ana,  ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes   el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar.  En el futuro le gustaría poder incrementar más cosas a su negocio  el cual le generaría mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar más productos para su bodega  (arroz, azúcar, menestras, etc.)   Y así seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes   y así poder salir adelante. A la vez  la Sra. Ana   y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos   con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado   y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. La Sra. Ana  es la segunda de la mano derecha  se le distingue por su polo de color verde.  Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Ana is 28 years old, is single, and is the mother of one child. She is one of the members of "LAS SOÑADORAS" group.

Ana set up a small grocery store at her home four years ago. She has managed to earn the loyalty of her customers and, for this reason, has generated enough profits to cover her household expenses.

In the future, she would like to increase her range of products, which would increase her profits. 

She will use the loan to buy more products for her grocery store such as rice, sugar, mixed vegetables, and the like. In this way, she will continue to meet her customers’ needs and get ahead.

Ana and the rest of the members are very grateful to Kiva for the loan granted and for the trust that has been placed in them.

In the photo, Ana is the second on the right, wearing a green T-shirt. She says goodbye and promises that she will fulfill all the goals she has set for herself.

loans.use: to buy more products such as rice, sugar, and the like.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
Walter es de la ciudad de Villarrica, tiene 50 años es comerciante pues tiene una despensa y también es agricultor,  con mucho esfuerzo pudo montar para su casa propia.
Se inició en su negocio hace más de 5  años, además se dedica a la producción de tomate, activad que le generó buen ingreso para iniciar su despensa, actualmente cuenta con cinco viveros con diferente época de plantación y cosecha.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su despensa,  como arroz, fideo, aceite, panificado, leche, azúcar, para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Walter is from the city of Villarrica. He is 50 years old and is a businessman. He has a store and is also a farmer. With great effort he was able to build his own house. He began his business more than 5 years ago. He also works growing tomatoes, a business that generated good income, allowing him to start his store.

He currently has 5 nurseries with different planting and harvesting seasons. He seeks this loan to be able to buy supplies for his store, such as rice, pasta, oil, baked goods, milk and sugar for his customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his store, such as rice, pasta, oil, baked goods, milk and sugar.

loans.name: Edith Melene

texts.es: Edith es soltera con 24 años de edad vive con sus padres y  estudia la carrera profesional de idiomas. Ella va en su 2 do ciclo de estudios en una universidad estatal. Edith se siente feliz ya que gracias a sus estudios podrá servir a la sociedad y ayudar a sus padres. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para el pago de su pensión de estudio. El deseo de Edith es de terminar satisfactoriamente sus estudios y ser más competitiva y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos. Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por apoyar a estudiantes como ella.
texts.en:
Edith is 24 years old and single. She lives with her parents and is studying for a degree in languages. She is in her second semester at a state university. Edith is happy that her studies will enable her to serve society and help her parents.

This is why she requested the loan to pay her school fees. Edith wants to finish her studies successfully and be more competitive to improve her income. She appreciates Kiva investors for their support of students like her.

loans.use: to pay her school fees.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto es de la ciudad de Pilar, es dueño de un comercio que se encuentra en un lugar muy bueno de la ciudad. Su local comercial es un Autoservicio, es soltero, vive en casa propia, que con sacrificio ha podido montar por medio de su trabajo.
Tiene venta de todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad y con ello surte a sus vecinos y otras personas de los alrededores. Roberto es una persona  muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que se esfuerza por poder crecer y salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar artículos de limpieza, bebidas, frutas, verduras y otros, para poder tener una variedad grande que poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Roberto is from the city of Pilar. He is the owner of a business which is located in a very good place in the city. His business is a mini mart. He is single and lives in his own home which with sacrifice he was able to build through his work.

He sells all sorts of primary needs products which supply his neighbors and others in the surroundings. Roberto is a very hard-working and enterprising person who makes the effort to be able to grow and get ahead.

He is requesting this loan to be able to buy cleaning products, drinks, fruits, vegetables and others to be able to have a large variety so he can continue with his sales as he has been doing.

loans.use: to buy cleaning products, drinks, fruits, vegetables and others.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her store, such as vegetables, fruits, canned goods, bakery items and so on.

loans.name: Triunfadores De Villa Virgen Group

texts.es: La alcancía comunal “Triunfadores de Villa Virgen” está conformada por 5 personas que decidieron triunfar en equipo, y está representada por su presidenta la Sra. Irene quien tiene 43 años de edad, es conviviente con 4 hijos pero solamente 1 aun depende de ella. Tiene como fuente de trabajo la confección de pulseras y demás adornos para vestir, adicional a ello realiza el servicio de confección de prendas de vestir. El préstamo lo utilizara para invertirlo en su negocio como comprar lanas, hilos, etc. su plan a futuro es consolidar su negocio y ayudar que su hija sea profesional. En la foto del grupo Irene se encuentra de pie en medio de sus demás compañeros sentados.
texts.en:
The “Triunfadores de Villa Virgen” communal bank is made up of five people who decided to triumph as a team. It is represented by it's president, Irene. She is 43 years old, is in a relationship and has four children but only one is still dependent on her.

Her source of work is making bracelets and other accessories. Besides this she makes clothing. She will use the loan to invest in her business by buying wool, thread, etc. Her future plans are to consolidate her business and help her daughter become a professional. In the group photo Irene is standing in the middle of her seated companions.

loans.use: to buy materials to make clothing.

loans.name: Natalio

texts.es:
Natalio tiene 68 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge sin hijos, en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Cañaris que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Ferreñeafe, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Natalio se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Natalio espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Natalio is 68 years old. He lives with his spouse with no children. He lives in his own house made of rustic materials in the district of Cañaris which is located in the province of Ferreñeafe, Lambayeque region on the North Coast of Peru. Life in this district is quiet and the inhabitants work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Natalio works in agriculture, specializing in growing coffee. He has 10 years experience in the field and has very good work and personal references in the area. The loan he has been awarded will be used to buy manure and fertilizer to carry out adequate maintenance of his coffee crops as well as contracting labor for the harvest. Doing this Natalio hopes to offer a higher quality coffee to his clients which will have a positive impact on his level of income and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.



Natalio se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Natalio espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to maintain his coffee crops adequately.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Célibataire, Yawa est une femme qui vit à Agoè avec deux enfants à charge. Agée de 45 ans, Yawa achète et revend les poules et pigeons trois fois par mois au marché. Yawa sollicite ce prêt pour commander des unités de poules et  pigeons afin de répondre favorablement aux besoins de ses clients et avoir une autonomie financière considérable pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en: Yawa is single and lives in Agoè with her two dependent children. She is 45 years old. Yawa buys chickens and pigeons at the market three times a month and then resells them.  She is seeking this loan to stock up on chickens and pigeons in order to meet customer demand and maintain her financial autonomy, with the goal of  providing for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy 15 chickens and 14 pigeons for resale.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 47 years old and married with five children. Her oldest child is 24 and her youngest is 14. She lives in Talibon, Bohol.

Imelda farms and sells seaweed, and she also fishes. She sells locally.

Imelda decided to borrow to buy materials used in seaweed farming, such as straw, softie (twine), and seaweed seedlings. These will help improve the yield of her farm and enable her to generate higher earnings. Thus, she will be able to expand her business and continue to support the needs of her children.

Imelda is doing her best to improve her income and to become financially stable.

loans.use: to buy materials used in seaweed farming, such as straw, softie (twine), and seaweed seedlings.

loans.name: Daima

texts.en:
Daima who is in her 40s is married with two children, one of whom is in school and the other one is grown up. She has been selling home products for 10 years now. She works from 8am to 7pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Daima's 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to restock the out-of-stock items in her home products stock and has paid back all her loans successfully. She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for their support. She used the profit to buy a plot, repay the loan, pay school fees and cover household expenses. She will use this loan to buy the best quality home products to meet her customers' requirements. She dreams of owning a general store, selling her products at a wholesale price.

Daima will make sure she pays back her loan within the loan's scheduled time.

loans.use: to buy the best quality home products to meet her customers' requirements.

loans.name: Greta

texts.en: Greta, from Kapan city in the Syunik region, is greatly happy to have a chance for a third Kiva partnership. She still has a trading business, selling women, men and children's clothes at the city’s wholesale market.  Greta is a widow; her three daughters are married and they live separately with their families. She mentions that despite having a medical education and some practice working in that field, she does not want to lose her trading business that for many years has been the source of her family’s income. Greta is thankful to her regular customers and she does her best to satisfy each of them with the nice variety of assortments in her stall and with the good prices of her merchandise, which attracts a lot of customers. Greta this time again wants to earn a profit from the beginning of the academic year, since for any clothes trading business, it is a good period to make a profit from the sale of children and women's clothes. With her Kiva loan amount, Greta again wants to buy a nice assortment of clothes for women and children for the beginning of the academic year.

loans.use: to buy a nice assortment of clothes for women and children for the beginning of the academic year.

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit is 25 years old. Two years ago, with Kiva's support, he greatly developed his business and this time again he relays on financial support, which will mean new and more orders and also some new ideas. Davit, having a specialty as an economist, chose the craft of jewelry making and jewelry design.

Being very interested in this occupation since his very young age, Davit now already is a skilled master and his works have great demand and popularity. He makes pendants, necklaces and rings by order. He usually takes private orders from his already loyal customers or sells his prepared jewelry at the city jewelry shops. Davit works in his house in a separate room, where he is surrounded by his necessary tools and equipment to realize his ideas and to make true the models that he already has in his imagination.

Davit lives with his mother and brother. This loan of 500,000 Armenian drams that Davit asks fo, as he must buy some new tools for his jewelry-making craft and some raw materials to manage the orders that he has now.

loans.use: to buy some new tools for his jewelry making craft and some raw materials to manage the orders that he has now.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: Doña Cristina de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tortas y hamburguesas desde hace 2 años, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias es como logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de toldos para el carreton que muestra la fotografia y materia prima para la elaboraciond e los alimentos y asi seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Doña Cristina is 61 years old and lives in her own house with her family.  For two years, she has made a living through the preparation and sale of cakes and burgers.  Her business is located near her place of residence and she has many customers.  With the income she earns she is able to pay some household expenses.  She is requesting a loan for the purchase of a canopy for the cart shown in the picture, and raw materials for the preparation of her foods, so as to continue her work since it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to buy a canopy for her cart and raw materials for the preparation of her foods.

loans.name: Tuhta

texts.ru:
Тухта жительница города Худжанд. Худжанд расположен на северной части Таджикистана. Этот город богат своими  древними традициями высокой культурой. Тухта из тех жителей, которая сохранила один из многих национальный символ народа. Она шьет "курпа" и "курпача". Тухта замужем и имеет детей. Она счастливая бабушка. Тухта 51 летняя женщина. 
   "Курпа" и "курпача"- это ватные матрасы. "Курпа" шьют стандартно квадратном размере, ее используют в качестве одеяла. Курпача длинные матрасы используется как диваны. Тухта более 2 лет занимается изготовлением "курпа" и "курпача". Тухта просит кредит для мероприятия обрезания внука.  Она не смогла копить достаточную сумму денег. Из-за нехватки денежных средств она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
Tuhta is a resident of the city of Khujand located in the northern part of Tajikistan. The city is famous for its long-standing traditions and sophisticated culture. Tuhta is a resident carefully preserving one of her people's national symbols. She sews "kurpa" and "kurpacha". She is married and has children. At the age of 51 she is a happy grandmother.

"Kurpa" and "kurpacha" are cotton mattresses. "Kurpa" is usually in the form of a square and can be used as a blanket. "Kurpacha" is a long mattress used as a sofa (an undercover). Tuhta has been involved in the business of making them for over two years. Now Tuhta is requesting a loan to pay for her grandson's circumcision. She was unable to save enough money which is why she requested a loan.

loans.use: to pay for her grandson's circumcision

loans.name: Zhumazhan

texts.ru: Жумажан, 53 года, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее высшее образование, на протяжении 20 лет работает преподавателем математики в школе. Ежемесячная заработная плата - 8,500 сом (KGS). В целях проведения ремонтных работ в доме, Жумажан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 19,000 сом (KGS) на покупку краски, штукатурки. Свои доходы Жумажан планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий и образование ее детей.
texts.en: Zhumazhan is 53 years old, married, with two kids. She has completed higher education and has been working as a school teacher of mathematics for over 20 years. Her monthly salary is 8,500 som (KGS). To renovate her house, Zhumazhan turned to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 19,000 som (KGS) to buy paint and plaster. She is going to invest the money to continue improving her family's living conditions and her children's education.

loans.use: to buy paints and plaster in order to renovate her house.

loans.name: Nurzhamal

texts.ru: Нуржамал успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве есть корова, 50 овец и лошадь. На 1,0 Га земли выращивает клевер. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет около 19,000 сом (KGS). Нуржамал обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для закупки лошади и сена, в качестве корма для скота. Доходы от кредита Нуржамал планирует использовать для дальнейшего увеличения своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Nurzhamal has successfully repaid her previous loan having used it for the designated purpose. She is grateful to Kiva and everyone who helped her to raise funds. She now owns a cow, 50 sheep and a horse. She also cultivates clover on her 1,0 ha of land. Her monthly income from the business is about 19,000 som (KGS). She requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum Bank to buy another horse and hay to feed the cattle. She is going to use the money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a horse, and hay to feed livestock.

loans.name: Asylgul

texts.ru: Асылгул, 30 лет, есть дочь школьного возраста, она замужем. Образование у Асылгул среднее, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством, стартовав 5 лет назад с 45,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Асылгул, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 3 коровы, 10 овец, 2 лошади. Ежемесячный доход составляет примерно 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асылгул обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en: Asylgul is 30 years old, married, with a daughter of school age. She has completed secondary education and breeds livestock for a living. She started her business five years ago with the seed capital of 45,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, Asylgul now owns three cows, 10 sheep and two horses. Her monthly income is about 11,000 som (KGS). To expand her business, Asylgul turned to Bai-Tushum Bank fora loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. She is going to invest the money to develop and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase some livestock to increase her herd.

loans.name: Jacoba Otilia

texts.es: Doña Jacoba de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 20 años a la venta de ropa su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal y tiene muchos clientes, gracias a su trabajo es como ha podido salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas ropa para damas y caballeros por mayor y asi continura con sus ventas ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo e ingresos.
texts.en:
Doña Jacoba is 53 years old and lives in her own house with her three children. For 20 years she has been working in the clothing sales business located in the municipal market. She has many customers. Thanks to her work, she has been able to move forward.

She is requesting for a loan to buy women's and men's clothing n from wholesale. This way she will continue with her sales, since this is her only source of work and income.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's clothing from wholesale

loans.name: Gumercindo

texts.es:
Gumercindo tiene 27 años de edad,soltero sin hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Sallique que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Gumercindo se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de lima, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de varios años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de lima así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Gumercindo espera ofrecer una lima de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Gumercindo is 27 years old and single with no children. He lives in his own house made from rustic materials in the Sallique district, which is located in the Jaén province in the Cajamarca region in the mountains north of Peru. Life in this district is calm. The people who live there work mainly in agriculture, commerce, and ranching.

Gumercindo works in agriculture, specifically in growing limes. He has several years of experience and very good personal and professional references in the area. The loan will be used to buy manure and fertilizers so he can adequately maintain his lime crops and be able to hire workers for the harvest season. Gumercindo hopes to provide his customers with higher-quality limes, which will have a positive impact on his level of income, thus improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers to adequately maintain his lime crops.

loans.name: Criselda

texts.en:
Criselda is 45 years old from Muntinlupa City, Philippines. Currently, she is selling variety of dried fish in the Alabang Market where she is earning about PHP 15,000 each month. She is thankful for having the business as it provides income for her family.

Criselda’s goal is for her children to finish college. She is a mother of two and they are both studying at college level. With the help of her husband Gerardo, a bus driver, they were able to support their children and pay for their daily needs and personal expenditures.

Criselda considers it an achievement as a parent to have her children reach college. She dreams of having her own store so that she will not need to rent a space anymore. She is applying for a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy variety of dried fish to add to her business. Having more products to sell means bigger profits to earn each day.

Criselda is consistent in attending a weekly fellowship group for CCT partners that consists of 15 to 30 members, where she gains spiritual strength from members' life-changing testimony, shares her own experience of God’s love, pays Microfinance loans, and listens to God’s word that is conveyed to them every week.

loans.use: To buy variety of dried fish to add to her business.

loans.name: Nueva Semilla Group

texts.es:
Gabriela es una mujer de 25 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo de 5 años, y su negocio es la peluquería a domicilio.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora y muy feliz. Su trabajo lo realiza en el ‘plan 3000’ área caracterizada por el origen su pobladores; en su mayoría migrantes del campo y mineros de occidente relocalizados. 
Gabriela es de tez morena, cabello largo negro y  físico delgado. Su lengua materna es el Guaraní y habla español (sentada al centro). La necesidad por mejorar su negocio la llevó a liderar la banca de emprendimiento, los negocios de los socios son; venta de ropa de segunda mano, venta de desayunos, venta de cosméticos, venta de refrescos, artesanía en cuero, venta de helado y panadería. Su negocio es la peluquería  a domicilio; ella realiza cortes de pelo, bases, rayitos, ondulaciones y todo tipo de tratamiento para el cabello, lo realiza a domicilio, “mis clientes son continuos y los productos que utilizo se me terminan rápidamente…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes continuos, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de productos de belleza por mayor. Su sueño es tener su propio salón de belleza, ella desea realizar la compra de productos de belleza por mayor para contar con material de trabajo constante. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Gabriela solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de belleza por mayor para contar con material de trabajo constante.
texts.en:
Gabriela is a 25 year old woman. She lives with her partner and has a 5 year old son. Her business is a home-based hair salon, which she operates in the "plan 3000" zone, an area known for the origins of its occupants; mostly migrants from the country and miners relocated from the west.

Gabriela has a dark complexion, long black hair and a slim build. Her native tongue is Guaraní, and she speaks Spanish. She is sitting in the middle in the photo. The need to improve her business has inspired her to lead her communal bank. The members' businesses are second-hand clothing sales, breakfast foods, cosmetic sales, sale of refreshments, leather crafts, ice cream and baking.

Her business is home hairdressing. She offers hair-cutting, perms, streaks, and all kinds of hair treatments in the home. She says that she has a regular flow of customers, and the products that she uses run out quickly.

Her business benefits from regular customers, but is handicapped by a lack of funds to buy beauty products at wholesale. Her dream is to have her own beauty salon. She would like to buy beauty products at wholesale in order to have steady work supplies. This is the first loan cycle in one year with the institution.

These are the reasons that Gabriela is seeking a loan to buy beauty products at wholesale in order to have steady work supplies.

loans.use: to buy beauty products at wholesale in order to have a steady supply.

loans.name: Irma Del Carmen

texts.es: Irma es una ama de casa de 48 años de edad que por su iniciativa, emprendió su propio negocio de elaboración y venta de comidas típicas, ella reside en Cartagena de Indias un municipio del departamento de Bolívar en donde se consolida su clientela que en su gran mayoría son vecinos y transeúntes del sector.  Todos los días su rutina inicia a las 4 a.m. con la preparación de los alimentos y en el transcurso del día, sus comensales llegan hasta su vivienda a solicitar las exquisiteces que prepara, así mismo una vez recibe el producido del día, realiza las compras de víveres para el día siguiente en el mercado de Bazurto.  Irma es una experta en la preparación de pasteles, almuerzos corrientes y  sancochos, por lo que cada vez más se incrementa la afluencia de clientes, en la actualidad está aplicando su segundo credikiva, con el cual invertirá en víveres entre ellos arroz, carne de diferentes clases, verduras y condimentos. Con esta inversión podrá abastecer a sus nuevos clientes y con los nuevos ingresos que obtendrá ofrecerá múltiples  beneficios para su familia. Su meta  a futuro es organizar mejor su negocio y realizar acciones en pro de incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Irma is a 48-year-old housewife who has founded, out of her initiative, her own business of making and selling traditional food. She lives in Cartagena de Indias, a municipal department of Bolívar, where she has consolidated a customer base. A great majority of her customers are neighbors and passers-by of the region.

Every day, her routine starts at 4am as she prepares food. During the course of the day, guests come to her house and ask for her prepared dishes. Once she receives the day's earning she purchases food for the next day at the Bazurto market.

Irma is an expert in baking cakes, making takeout lunches, and preparing stews. Thanks to these specialties, she is expanding her customer base every time.

Recently she is requesting her second loan with Kiva, which she will invest in food supplies such as rice, different classes of meat, vegetables, and condiments. With this investment she will be able to accommodate her new customers, and with the new income, obtain multiple benefits for her family.

Her goal for the future is to better organize her business and increase sales.

loans.use: invest in food supplies, among them rice, different classes of meat, vegetables, and condiments

loans.name: Dora Celia

texts.es: Dora de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella es empleada en una empresa privada desde hace 14 años y con lo que obtiene en su trabajo y la ayuda del esposo es como pueden salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda contruyendo un tapial en la parte de enfrente de su casa, pero como posee suficiente capital esta solicitando un credito para la compra de materiales de construccion y asi tener una vivienda segura para su familia.
texts.en:
Dora is 38 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and her son. She has been employed at a private company for 14 years. Her family gets ahead from what she earns from her work and from her husband's help. 

Dora wants to improve her housing by building a rammed earth wall in the front part of her house. But since she does not have sufficient capital, she is requesting a loan to buy construction materials. This way she will have a safer house for her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura al cultivo de granos basicos y hortalizas, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Felicita is 44 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and two children. For 20 years she has been working in agriculture, in the cultivation of basic grains and vegetables.

When harvest is ready, she sells the produce in the adjacent villages. She now has many fixed customers. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, liquid and solid fertilizers, pest controls, herbicides, etc. to continue with her cultivation as this is her only source of work and income. This way she wants to have better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, liquid and solid fertilizers, pest controls,  herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Doña Rosa vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella tiene un negocio de venta de tortas y hamburguesas desde hace 15 años, tiene muy buena clientela pues vende su comida a un buen precio, con las ganancias que obtiene cubre algunos gastos de su hogar, ella solicita nuevamente un crédito que le permita poder comprar mas pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes y asi poder seguir con sus trabajo para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Doña Rosa lives in her own house with her husband. She has had a business of selling tortas and hamburgers for 15 years. She has a good customer base, so she sells her food at a good price. With her earnings she covers some of her living costs. 

She is requesting a loan which will allow her to buy more bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, sausage, among other ingredients. This way she will be able to continue with her work to have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy more bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, sausage, among other ingredients

loans.name: Carolyne

texts.en:
Carolyne is a single woman. She has six children. She describes herself as ambitious. She operates a retail shop where she sells beauty products. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate finances. She will use the KES20,000 loan to buy more stock of beauty products. Her business goal is to be financially stable within five years. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank.

The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products.

loans.name: Lindaura

texts.es:
Lindaura tiene 26 años de edad, es soltera, sin hijos, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Lindaura se dedica a la venta de abarrotes; con más de 2 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en su domicilio; ella solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, compra de más mercadería(arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros), dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas; mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lindaura is 26 years old, single, has no children and lives in the family home in a rural area in the district of Oyotún. The district is part of the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. Agriculture, livestock and trade are the main ways of earning a living in her community.

Lindaura earns a living selling groceries from a business based at her home and has over 2 years of experience in this business. She is applying for a loan in order to buy more goods (rice, sugar, oil) which will allow her to increase sales, improve revenue and profits as well as improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to increase the stock levels in her business.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: Jose Luis es un joven universitario de 22 años. Actualmente se encuentra trabajando como ayudante en una mecánica. El decidió estudiar la carrera de Mecánica de mantenimiento porque desde muy pequeño le gustaba ya que miraba a su padre trabajar también como mecánico. Ademas de ser un joven aplicado en sus ratos libres le gusta salir a jugar fútbol con sus amigos. El solicito el préstamo para poder pagar sus pensiones de estudios. Ya se encuentra a medio ciclo de terminar su carrera. Se siente muy agradecido con las personas que le pueden ayudar a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is a young university student who is 22 years old. He is currently working as an assistant in a mechanic's workshop. He decided to study a degree in mechanical maintenance as he had liked it from an early age due to having watched his father work as a mechanic.

As well as being young and hard working, in his spare time he likes to go out and play football with his friends. He is applying for a loan in order to pay his student housing costs. He is already half way towards finishing his studies and feels great gratitude towards the people that will help him to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to pay his student housing costs.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Angela de 47 años vive en casa propia con su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal desde hace 13 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y también vende de forma ambulantes por las diferentes colonias, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo es como ha salido adelante con su familia, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de perfumes, lociones, cremas, shampoo, desodorantes etc. todo por mayor y así poder seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Angela, 47 years old, lives in her own house with her daughter. She has worked selling personal care products for 13 years. Her business is located in her house and she also sells as a street vendor in the different colonies. With what she gets from her work, she has gotten ahead with her family. She is asking for a loan to purchase perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc., all in bulk and, so, to be able to continue with her work to have better income.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc., all in bulk.

loans.name: Deyvi Cornelio

texts.es: Deyvi tiene 23 años es estudiante de la carrera de Electricista Industrial; carrera que cursa en una universidad local, eligió esta profesión por vocación porque le gusta mucho ya que su padre también es electricista, son 03 años que lleva estudiando toda la carrera tiene como duración 05 años. También se dedica a la música que es algo que lo apasiona y los fines de semana sale a jugar futbol con sus amigos. Deyvi solicito este préstamo para poder para las pensiones de su universidad. El está muy agradecido con los inversionistas de KIVA que permiten que obtenga este crédito.
texts.en: Deyvi is 23 years old, he is a student in the industrial electrician program, a program which he studies at a local university. He chose this profession by vocation because he likes it a lot, since his father is also an electrician. He has been studying for 3 years, and the entire program lasts 5 years. He also works at music, which is something he is passionate about, and on weekends he goes out to play soccer with his friends. Deyvi asks for this loan to be able to pay the university fees. He is very grateful to the Kiva investors who allow him to get this loan.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella posee desde hace 10 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia tambien posee una tortilleria, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria, 45 years old, lives in her own house with her son. She has had a small store located in her home for 10 years. She also has a tortilla-making business. She has many customers due to her good prices and the friendliness she has while selling. She is asking for a loan to be able to purchase more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet breads, etc. and, so, to be able to have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet breads, etc.

loans.name: Madeleine Susan

texts.es: Madeleine es una  universitaria de 23 años. Actualmente se encuentra trabajando en una pequeña empresa como secretaria. Ella decidió estudiar la carrera de Administración y Sistemas porque ella considera que es necesario contar con profesionales capaces de tomar decisiones que generen valor económico y social en una empresa. Además de dedicarse a su trabajo y estudios en sus ratos libres le gusta leer libros, revistas y internet para estar muy informada de todo lo que sucede. Comenta que quiere especializarse en Recursos Humanos. Ella solicito el préstamo para poder pagar sus pensiones de la universidad. ya se encuentra a 1 año de terminar su carrera. Se siente muy agradecida con los socios de Kiva por ayudarla a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Madeleine is a university student, age 33. She is currently working as a secretary in a small firm.
She decided to get a degree in administration and management information systems, because she considers it necessary to rely on professionals who are able to make decisions generating economic and social value in a company.

In addition to her work and study, Madeleine enjoys reading books and magazines as well as internet access to stay well informed of all that is happening. She comments that she wants to specialize in human resources. She has applied for this loan to pay for her university credit fees, she is a year away from completing her degree.

She is very grateful to Kiva lenders for supporting her in achieving her goals.

loans.use: to pay her university credit fees.

loans.name: Ana Griselda

texts.es: na de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica desde hace 15 años a la pesca artesanal, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de redes, para continuar con su trabajo y poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Ana is 40 years old and lives in her own house with her family. She has worked in traditional fishing for 15 years and sells her fish in the different markets near her home. With her earnings, she is able to make ends meet.

Ana is requesting a loan to buy nets so that she can continue her work and earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de productos para limpieza de picsinas se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 5 años y ya tiene muchos clientes establecidos con lo que obtiene de sus ventas es como ella puede salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas prodcutos para picsinas por mayor y asi poder continuar con sus ventas que le generan mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Victoria, 41 years old, lives in her own house with her family. She works selling pool cleaning products. She has worked at this job for 5 years and now has many established customers. With what she earns from her sales, she can get ahead. She is asking for a loan to purchase more pool products in bulk and, so, to be able to continue with her sales so they generate better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase pool products in bulk.

loans.name: Los Geranios Group

texts.es: “LOS GERANIOS” es un grupo conformada por mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras. Corina tiene 41 años de edad es casada. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza joyas en fantasía fina y ropa a través de catálogos. Y a la vez expende miel de abeja. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más cosméticos joyas aretes perfumes y ropa de estación de verano polos blusas jeans. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Corina  es la primera del lado izquierdo.
texts.en: “Los Geranios” is a group made up of hard-working and enterprising women. Corina is 41 years old, and is married. She works selling beauty products, fine costume jewelry, and clothing from catalogs. She also sells honey. The loan will be invested in the purchase of more cosmetics, jewelry, earrings, perfumes, and summer seasonal clothing, shirts, blouses and jeans. The group is grateful to the Kiva investors for the offered loan. Corina is the first on the left.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics, jewelry, and clothing.

loans.name: Estrella De Belen Group

texts.es:
LA ASOCIACION COMUNAL  ESTRELLA DE BELEN ESTA CONFORMADA POR NUEVE MUJERES, MADRES SOLTERAS RESPONSABLES DE QUINCE HIJOS, TODOS MENORES DE EDAD, SON ORIGINARIOS DE MALPAISILLO, SE CARACTERIZAN POR SER TRABAJADORES, RESPONSABLES CON GANAS DE SUPERACION PERSONAL, ENS SUS RATOS LIBRE LE GUSTA DISFRUTAR DE TIEMPO DE CALIDAD CON SUS HIJOS, EN LA ACTUALIDAD PERSEVERAN CON SUS DIFERENTES ACTIVIDADES ECONOMICA PARA HACER CRECER EL NEGOCIO, Y CUMPLIR SUS SUEÑOS Y METAS COMO BRINDARLES ESTUDIOS A SUS HIJOS Y MEJORAS SUS VIVIENDAS. 
GRACIAS  A SUS GANAS DE SALIR ADELANTE LA CORDINADORA ES JESSICA Y TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONOMICA UNA PULPERIA ES UNA PEQUEÑA TIENDA QUE VENDE PRODUCTOS COMESTIBLES COMO : ARROZ, AZUCAR, LECHE, PAN, HUEVOS, JABON, DETERGENTES, GALLETAS,JUGOS, GASEOSAS, ETC. ELLA DEDICA UNAS DOCE HORAS DIARIAS OFRECIENDO SUS PRODUCTOS.EL OBJETIVO DEL CREDITO ES INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y SURTIR SU NEGOCIO EN LA COMPRA Y VENTA DE PRODUCTOS COMESTIBLES PARA SASTIFACER LA DEMANDA DE SUS CLIENTES, Y EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS.
texts.en:
The community association Estrella De Belen ("Star of Bethlehem") is made up of nine women: single mothers with 15 children under the age of 18. They come from Malpaisillo and are hard-working, responsible and looking to improve themselves. In their free time they like to spend quality time with their children. They are currently persevering with their different occupations in order to grown their businesses and realise their dreams and goals, such as providing for their children's education and improving their homes.

Jessica is the coordinator, thanks to her desire to get ahead. Her business is a small grocery store selling food and other products, such as rice, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, biscuits, soap, detergents, juices and fizzy drinks. She dedicates around 12 hours to her business everyday, selling her products. With this loan, the aim is to invest in working capital and stock her business with products to sell, in order to meet customer demand and, as a result, increase her income in the near future.

loans.use: to buy food products such as rice, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, beans, biscuits, juices and fizzy drinks.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa de 66 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, su hijo y su suegro, ella se dedica desde hace 30 años a la venta de tamales de pollos su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes gracias a sus venta y la ayuda de su esposo es como ha podido salir adelante con sus gastos, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion de los alimentos y asi tener mas ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Tomasa is 66 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, her son and her father-in-law. For 30 years she has made a living selling chicken tamales from her home; she has a lot of customers. Thanks to her sales and help from her husband, she has been able to get ahead and meet her expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy the ingredients to make food and therefore increase her income.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients to make food.

loans.name: Aml

texts.en:
Aml is 25, married, and has two children. Her husband works as a part-time-farmer and she has a livestock fattening project.

Aml is requesting a 5,000 EGP loan to buy animals such as goats and lambs to increase her income. This will help her husband with the family income and enable them to afford education for their children.

loans.use: to buy animals such as goats and lambs.

loans.name: Lineth

texts.en:
Lineth is 31 years old. She is married and has three children. Her business is farming. She has been in the business for 10 years. She earns a monthly income of 8,000 Kenya shillings.

This is her first loan from VisionFund Kenya. She will use the loan to buy a water pump and fertilizer. She will use the profits from her expanded business to pay school fees for her children. Her hopes and dreams are to have a happy family.

loans.use: to buy a water pump and fertilizer.

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is a 36-year-old housewife living in a sector in Jordan called Irbid. She is a mother of five children. She is very ambitious and helpful and she wants to be a productive woman.

Hanan`s husband worked with a low income, and he believed that his income was not enough to cover his family's needs. So Hanan decided to provide another source of income. She decided to support her husband by chopping vegetables such as mallow, carrots and peas for her husband to sell to the shops.

Now she is applying for a loan to help her expand her business and buy new tools to help her in chopping and buy more vegetables to increase her products and her income.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and chopping tools to increase her products and her income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheet, wood, nails and wire to change the roof of his house.

loans.name: Rachel

texts.en:
Rachel is a 42-year-old tailor and a boutique proprietor at Mikindani, Mombasa, Kenya. She is a mother of one child, who is separated from her spouse. She has been in this business for the last 11 years and is doing well.

This is her second loan from VisionFund to finance her business.

She will use the loan to purchase African print materials for making ladies dresses; the anticipated profit will be used to educate her daughter at secondary school.

She hopes to have a successful family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase African print materials for making ladies dresses.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su conyuge, en casa propia de material rústico de un piso ubicada , San Lorenzo es una comunidad donde su población se dedica a la agricultura cultivos de café, caña de azúcar, y productos de pan llevar, cría de ganado vacuno y comercio, que pertenece al distrito de Pimpingos, Provincia de Cutervo, Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza es la cria de ganado vacuno en inverna propia, dicha inverna se ubica a 30 minutos lomas abajo de caserio, su esposa le apoya en esta labor ordeñando una vaca, para posteriormente ofrecer quesos preparados artesanalmente por ella misma, receta que lo heredo de su abuela materna y venta de leche fresca a sus vecinos y moradores de su Caserío, solicita el prestamo para compra de otra cabeza de ganado de esta manera podrá aumentar su volumen de ventas y podra mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santiago, 52, lives with his wife in his own home of a single floor, made of rustic materials. They live in San Lorenzo, a community in the district of Pimpingos, province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Here people work in agriculture, growing coffee, sugar and basic crops, raising livestock, and in commerce.

He works raising cattle in a winter pasture of his own, located thirty minutes away down the hill from the village. His wife assists him with the milking of a cow and preparation of artisan cheese that they sell, this is work that her maternal grandmother taught her, passing down the recipe. She also sells fresh milk to the neighbors and villagers.

Santiago is applying for this loan to buy another cow. He will be able in this way to increase the sales and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy another cow.

loans.name: Saied

texts.en:
Saied is 31, married, and has three children.

He has a small fattening project and is requesting a 5,000 EGP loan to buy a head of cattle. This will help him increase the monthly income from the project and afford his family's basic needs

loans.use: To buy a head of cattle.

loans.name: Lianna

texts.en:
Lianna is 36 years old and she lives in Lchashen village of the Gergharkunik region. Lianna is married and she has two children.

With her nice family she runs a farm, which is a very cute one. In her farm she has cows, calves, heifers and chickens. Her farm products are milk, macun (a national dairy product), cheese, some little meat and eggs. All these products Lianna sells either locally or at the city’s wholesale market.

Lianna’s husband also works as a driver, and together this couple do their best to provide all that is needed for their two pretty children.

Now this loan is very important for Lianna’s farm as she wants to buy a lot of fodder for her farm cattle, since autumn season is time for farmers little by little to store fodder for colder seasons.

loans.use: to buy fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna with her large family lives in Lchashen village of the Gegharkunik region. She lives with her husband, her twins boys and her parents-in-law.

Susanna has vocational medical education and for a long time she worked as a nurse. Then she gave it up and now she manages work very different from her specialty. She works at the bread factory as a baker.

Susanna now has some health problem and she feels weakness and discomfort. In order to solve her health problem, she asks this loan of 200,000 Armenian drams and she thanks beforehand all the Kiva lenders that will help her with her request.

loans.use: to solve her health problem.

loans.name: Arevik

texts.en:
Arevik lives with her husband and son in Tsovagyugh village of Gegharkunik region. Arevik has two sons and a daughter. Now only her smallest son lives with Arevik since her other two children are already married and they live with their families separately.

Arevik, having no higher education, has always been engaged in farming. All the work about her farm she manages with the help of her husband. On the farm she has cows, a calf, bulls, a pig, sheep, lambs and chickens. She sells from her farm's great assortment of dairy products such as milk, cheese, macun (a national dairy product), curd, meat and eggs. For agricultural work, Arevik needs her husband's help since he has good selling skills. They manage to have a good harvest of potatoes from their land and they sell it to re-sellers.

Now Arveik asks for this loan of 700.000 Armenian drams, as she wants to buy a lot of fodder for her farm cattle. She is thankful beforehand for her greatly expected support.

loans.use: to buy a lot of fodder for her farm cattle; she is thankful beforehand for her greatly expected support.

loans.name: Denna

texts.en:
This is Denna, 30 years old, from the province of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. Married to Jonathan, a tricycle driver, they have three children. Life in a developing economy is not easy, but the couple help seach other make a living to adequately meet their family's needs.

Denna is shown in the photo in her small general store, which retails essential food and household items. She also operates a tricycle which her husband drives. A tricycle is a motorcycle with a side car that carries around four passengers. It is a common means of transportation in the Philippines and serves as a kind of taxi for short distance travel.

A proper and regular maintenance of her tricycle is necessary to ensure efficient and safe service. In view of this, she is humbly seeking your help in the amount of 19,000 to pay for new tires and other spare parts for her tricycle. This will allow for good performance of her unit, thus a steady income for her family's personal and household needs.

Denna's simple dream is for her businesses to grow and hopefully acquire another tricycle unit. She prays to always have a happy family. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for new tires and other spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Samia

texts.en:
Samia is 58, a widow who has four children.

The income of her husband's pension is very small and can barely cover the monthly expenses of her family, so she started a small poultry project in a small place in her house.

She is requesting a 5,000 EGP loan to buy more birds such as geese, ducks and chickens to generate more income and cover the increasing expenses of her family.

loans.use: To buy more birds such as geese, ducks and chickens.

loans.name: Anushavan

texts.en:
Anushavan is 53 years old and he lives in Tsovagyugh village of the Gegharkunik region. He lives with his son. Anushavan has higher education in engineering.

For many years he worked at the laboratory of a bread baking workshop. He says he liked this work so much that soon he established his own bread baking workshop and here, with his son, he bakes lavash, which is a kind of specific Armenian bread.

Anushavan also has a cute farm and cattle, but he spends most part of his time in his workshop and he does this baking work with great love and keeps the traditions of making it with all the details of ingredients. He sells the finished product to local markets. His son also distributes lavash to the local restaurants and also to the canteens of rest houses in the region. (Here is located the beautiful Lake Sevan, which makes this district a perfect resort for people.)

Anushavan asks this loan for developing his business and he wants to buy a great amount of flour to store. This will enable him to work without stops when he has great orders of lavash to make.

loans.use: to buy great amount of flour for lavash making.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, cabbages, onions, etc.

loans.name: El Pucatoro De San Agustin De Cajas Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “El Pucatoro de San Agustin de Cajas” y está formado por 06 integrantes responsables. Yenny de 34 años de edad es conviviente con 03 hijos menores de edad. Yenny se dedica a la Ganadería. Desde muy pequeña se dedica  a la Ganadería junto a sus padres, gracias a su constante dedicación puede darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Ella solicitó el crédito para la compra de semillas y alimentos balanceados para sus ganados. El grupo “El Pucatoro de San Agustin de Cajas” agradecen a los inversionistas Kiva por darles la oportunidad de conseguir sus metas. Yeny es la segunda que esta a la mano derecha chompa de color rojo.
texts.en:
This is the group “El Pucatoro de San Agustin de Cajas”, made up of six responsible members.
